duties_responsibilities.duty: Routine housekeeping including laundry, cleaning of bathroom, kitchen, refrigerator, changing bed linens, vacuuming, sweeping, mopping floors, dusting, and light pick up
Meal planning and preparation, monitoring client's food consumption, menu planning, and clean-up
Assistance in preparation of shopping list, shopping to nearest grocery store or pharmacy, accompanying client to doctor's/grocery store
Assistance in food consumption and companionship

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, GED, Letter of Experience, College Diploma
